metadata.title: CVE-2024-3120 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-buffer overflow vulnerability exists in all versions of sngrepsince v1.4.1. The flaw is due to inadequate bounds checking when copying'Content-Length' and 'Warning' headers into fixed-size buffers in thesip_validate_packet and sip_parse_extra_headers functions within src/sip.c.This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code orcause a denial of service (DoS) via crafted SIPÂ messages.

criterions.comment: sngrep package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
